securityCode.bodyDescription: We have sent your mail a code, copy and paste on this form to activate your account
securityCode.infoText: Did not the code come to your email?
securityCode.checkCodeChar:
Wrong code, accepted characters:

a-z A-Z 0-9
securityCode.mailContent:
Hello %s, the account was activated successfully.

Panel link:

PANEL

Activation date: %s

If you did not create this account, ignore this message, your email will be removed from our website in the next 48 hours, a thousand apologies.
securityCode.log: Account admin activated correctly from the panel
securityCode.bodyDescriptionVerify: We have sent your mail a code, copy and paste on this form to verify your account
securityCode.mailContentVerify:
Hello %s, The account was successfully verified.

Panel link:

PANEL

Verification date: %s

If you did not create this account, ignore this message, your email will be removed from our website in the next 48 hours, a thousand apologies.
securityCode.logVerify: Account verified correctly from the panel
